name: The Bombin' Baddies
description:
Will you ever see the end to this story? Find out today...

Survive and jump through 35 levels of bombs and pirates and challenge bosses to get the treasure in the end!

The Bombin' Baddies is an experimental fusion between two game genre. The main, being an arcade jumping game, and the secondary, being the final stages of an action/adventure game.
